pageContent: Purpose: Erectile dysfunction is one of the most concerning toxicities for patients in the treatment of prostate cancer. The inconsistent evaluation of sexual function (SF) and limited follow-up data have necessitated additional study to clarify the rate and timing of erectile dysfunction after external beam radiotherapy (EBRT) for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Sexual functioning and quality of life after prostate cancer treatment: considering sexual desire
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/14972470/
